DOC.brief_summary: Exposure healthy subject high altitude hypoxia elicits change cardiovascular , respiratory metabolic feature weel exercise performance similar , aspect , observe chronic heart failure . Exposure high altitude hypoxia represent suitable model assess different treatment propose pathological condition . Our aim evaluate impact two different third-generation beta-blockers use heart failure ( carvedilol nebivolol ) cardiovascular , respiratory , metabolic profile exercise performance high altitude .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Nebivolol Versus Carvedilol Cardiopulmonary Function High Altitude Healthy Subjects .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods . Study Subjects . Adults , males female , non smoke healthy volunteer , sea-level resident engage regular endurance exercise training , take medication recruit . As study compare effect beta-blockers exercise performance high altitude , sample size set treatment arm define basis sample size previous investigation show significant change exercise performance normal subject take medication . Study design . Time 0 . Screening , enrollement randomization . Subjects meet inclusion/exclusion criterion undergo sea-level , general laboratory investigation physical examination . Eligible subject double blindly randomize either placebo ( one tablet twice daily ) , carvedilol ( one 25 mg tablet twice daily ) , nebivolol ( one 5 mg tablet morning one placebo tablet even ) . Time 1 . Before start medication , sea level overnight fast , subject undergo : blood pressure heart rate measurement , 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring , Doppler heart ultrasound , cardiopulmonary exercise test , rest energy expenditure measurement . Time 2 . After three week allocate treatment , sea-level , overnight fast , subject undergo : blood pressure heart rate measurement , 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring , Doppler heart ultrasound , cardiopulmonary exercise test , rest energy expenditure measurement . Time 3 . Under treatment within first two day high altitude exposure ( Regina Margherita hut , Monte Rosa , altitude 4559 ) , subject undergo overnight fast blood pressure heart rate measurement , 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring , Doppler heart ultrasound , cardiopulmonary exercise test , rest energy expenditure measurement , acute mountain sickness quantification Lake Louise Score . - Protocol blood pressure heart rate measurement . Blood pressure heart rate measure accord current European guideline ( Task Force Management Arterial Hypertension European Society Hypertension ( ESH ) European Society Cardiology ( ESC ) . 2007 Guidelines Management Arterial Hypertension . J Hypertens 2007 ; 25:1105-1187 . - Protocol 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure monitoring . Ambulatory blood pressure monitoring perform accord current European guideline ( O'Brien E , et al . Practice guideline European Society Hypertension clinic , ambulatory self blood pressure measurement . J Hypertens 2005 ; 23 : 1697-701 ) . - Protocol Doppler heart ultrasound . All echographic-Doppler examination perform two operator use portable device ( Vivid I , GE Ultrasound ) accord current guideline ( Lang RM , et al . Recommendations chamber quantification . Eur J Echocardiogr 2006 ; 7 : 79-108 - Protocol cardiopulmonary exercise test . Tests perform evaluated accord current European Society Cardiology guideline ( Eur J Cardiovasc Prev Rehabil 13:150-164 2006 ; Eur J Cardiovasc Prev Rehabil 2006 ; 13:300-311 ) . All test perform use cyclo-ergometer ( Ergometrics 100 , Ergoline , Bitz , Germany ) metabolic cart ( Oxycon Mobile software v. 4.6 , VIASYS Healthcare GmbH , Wurburg , Germany ) . The exercise protocol include 10 minute monitor sit rest , follow 3 minute unload pedal 30 W load increment every 2 minute exhaustion . Breath-by-breath ventilation , respiratory gas , one-lead ECG pulse oxymetry ( SpO2 ) record throughout test . Arterial blood pressure measure mercury sphygmomanometer duplicate end rest phase 30 W step , peak exercise . Cardiopulmonry exercise test blindly independently evaluate two expert reader . The anaerobic threshold identify standard technique ( Wasserman K. Breathing exercise . N Engl J Med 1978 ; 298:780-785 . VE/VCO2 slope calculate slope linear relationship VE VCO2 measure respiratory compensation point . - Protocol rest energy expenditure measurement . The energy expenditure calculate accord abbreviated formula provide Weir ( Weir JB . New method calculate metabolic rate special reference protein metabolism . J Physiol Lond 1949 ; 55:14-21 ) . O2 consumption CO2 production ( integrated 1 min ) measure 30 min . Baseline value calculate average reading take last 10 min . - Protocol assessment acute mountain sickness . Acute mountain sickness ( AMS ) assess mean Lake Louise AMS Scoring system ( Roach RC , Bärtsch P et al . The Lake Louise AMS Scoring Consensus Committee . The Lake Louise acute mountain sickness score system . In : Sutton JR , Houtson CS , Coates G , eds . Hypoxia Molecular Medicine . Burlington , VT : Queen City Printers ; 1993:272-274 ) . - Statistical analysis . Data report mean ± SD . Data management analysis perform SPSS version 13.0 ( SPSS Inc , Chicago , IL , USA ) . Differences among group , change time within group ( time effect ) , interaction ( differ trend time among group ) , assess two-way repeated measure ANOVA unpaired Student 's t-test Bonferroni correction whenever need . For parameter cardiopulmonary exercise test , mean value compute 20 second . Spearman correlation use ass relationship peak VO2 respiratory haemodynamic variable altitude . A P level < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Men woman racial background healthy sealevel resident age > = 18 year , = < 65 year SBP < 130 mmHg DBP < 80 mmHg , average two measure sceening visit FG < 100 mg/dl ( 5.6 mmol/l ) BMI < 25 write informed consent sign Exclusion Criteria engagement regular exercise training smoking habit enrol another research study current previous cardiovascular , metabolic disease cronic disease current treatment medical condition medical condition prevent contraindication exposure altitude hypoxia gastrointestinal disorder interfere drug absorption know allergy contraindication betablockers pregnant lactate woman ; woman reproductive age use recognize contraceptive method . malignancy within last 5 year drug abuse alcohol abuse within last 5 year history noncompliance medical regimen incapacity unwillingness sign inform consent participation investigational clinical trial within last 3 month
